00038 GHOST_SystemSDL::GHOST_SystemSDL()
00039     :
00040       GHOST_System()
00041 {
00042     if(SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO|SDL_INIT_TIMER) != 0) {
00043         printf ("Error initializing SDL:  %s\n", SDL_GetError());
00044     }
00045 
00046     /* SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_MULTISAMPLEBUFFERS, 1); */
00047     /* SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES, 4); */
00048     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00049     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00050     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00051     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00052     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00053     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_ALPHA_SIZE, 8);
00054 }
00055 
00056 GHOST_SystemSDL::~GHOST_SystemSDL()
00057 {
00058     SDL_Quit();
00059 }
00060 
00061 GHOST_IWindow *
00062 GHOST_SystemSDL::createWindow(const STR_String& title,
00063                               GHOST_TInt32 left,
00064                               GHOST_TInt32 top,
00065                               GHOST_TUns32 width,
00066                               GHOST_TUns32 height,
00067                               GHOST_TWindowState state,
00068                               GHOST_TDrawingContextType type,
00069                               bool stereoVisual,
00070                               const GHOST_TUns16 numOfAASamples,
00071                               const GHOST_TEmbedderWindowID parentWindow
00072                               )
00073 {
00074     GHOST_WindowSDL *window= NULL;
00075 
00076     window= new GHOST_WindowSDL (this, title, left, top, width, height, state, parentWindow, type, stereoVisual, 1);
00077 
00078     if (window) {
00079         if (GHOST_kWindowStateFullScreen == state) {
00080             SDL_Window *sdl_win = window->getSDLWindow();
00081             SDL_DisplayMode mode;
00082 
00083             static_cast<GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL *> (m_displayManager)->getCurrentDisplayModeSDL(mode);
00084 
00085             SDL_SetWindowDisplayMode(sdl_win, &mode);
00086             SDL_ShowWindow(sdl_win);
00087             SDL_SetWindowFullscreen(sdl_win, SDL_TRUE);
00088         }
00089 
00090         if (window->getValid()) {
00091             m_windowManager->addWindow(window);
00092             pushEvent(new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowSize, window));
00093         }
00094         else {
00095             delete window;
00096             window= NULL;
00097         }
00098     }
00099     return window;
00100 }

00102 GHOST_TSuccess
00103 GHOST_SystemSDL::init() {
00104     GHOST_TSuccess success = GHOST_System::init();
00105 
00106     if (success) {
00107         m_displayManager = new GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL(this);
00108 
00109         if (m_displayManager) {
00110             return GHOST_kSuccess;
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114     return GHOST_kFailure;
00115 }

00117 void
00118 GHOST_SystemSDL::getMainDisplayDimensions(GHOST_TUns32& width,
00119                                           GHOST_TUns32& height) const
00120 {
00121     SDL_DisplayMode mode;
00122     SDL_GetCurrentDisplayMode(0, &mode); /* note, always 0 display */
00123     width= mode.w;
00124     height= mode.h;
00125 }

00133 GHOST_TSuccess
00134 GHOST_SystemSDL::getModifierKeys(GHOST_ModifierKeys& keys) const
00135 {
00136     SDL_Keymod mod= SDL_GetModState();
00137 
00138     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyLeftShift,    (mod & KMOD_LSHIFT) != 0);
00139     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyRightShift,   (mod & KMOD_RSHIFT) != 0);
00140     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyLeftControl,  (mod & KMOD_LCTRL) != 0);
00141     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyRightControl, (mod & KMOD_RCTRL) != 0);
00142     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyLeftAlt,      (mod & KMOD_LALT) != 0);
00143     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyRightAlt,     (mod & KMOD_RALT) != 0);
00144     keys.set(GHOST_kModifierKeyOS,           (mod & (KMOD_LGUI|KMOD_RGUI)) != 0);
00145 
00146     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00147 }

00149 #define GXMAP(k,x,y) case x: k= y; break;
00150 
00151 static GHOST_TKey
00152 convertSDLKey(SDL_Scancode key)
00153 {
00154     GHOST_TKey type;
00155 
00156     if ((key >= SDL_SCANCODE_A) && (key <= SDL_SCANCODE_Z)) {
00157         type= GHOST_TKey( key - SDL_SCANCODE_A + int(GHOST_kKeyA));
00158     } else if ((key >= SDL_SCANCODE_1) && (key <= SDL_SCANCODE_0)) {
00159         type= (key == SDL_SCANCODE_0) ? GHOST_kKey0 : GHOST_TKey(key - SDL_SCANCODE_1 + int(GHOST_kKey1));
00160     } else if ((key >= SDL_SCANCODE_F1) && (key <= SDL_SCANCODE_F12)) {
00161         type= GHOST_TKey(key - SDL_SCANCODE_F1 + int(GHOST_kKeyF1));
00162     } else if ((key >= SDL_SCANCODE_F13) && (key <= SDL_SCANCODE_F24)) {
00163         type= GHOST_TKey(key - SDL_SCANCODE_F13 + int(GHOST_kKeyF13));
00164     } else {
00165         switch(key) {
00166             /* TODO SDL_SCANCODE_NONUSBACKSLASH */
00167 
00168         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_BACKSPACE,      GHOST_kKeyBackSpace);
00169         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_TAB,            GHOST_kKeyTab);
00170         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RETURN,         GHOST_kKeyEnter);
00171         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_ESCAPE,         GHOST_kKeyEsc);
00172         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_SPACE,          GHOST_kKeySpace);
00173 
00174         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_SEMICOLON,      GHOST_kKeySemicolon);
00175         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_PERIOD,         GHOST_kKeyPeriod);
00176         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_COMMA,          GHOST_kKeyComma);
00177         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_APOSTROPHE,     GHOST_kKeyQuote);
00178         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_GRAVE,          GHOST_kKeyAccentGrave);
00179         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_MINUS,          GHOST_kKeyMinus);
00180         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_EQUALS,         GHOST_kKeyEqual);
00181 
00182         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_SLASH,          GHOST_kKeySlash);
00183         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_BACKSLASH,      GHOST_kKeyBackslash);
00184         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_EQUALS,      GHOST_kKeyEqual);
00185         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_LEFTBRACKET,    GHOST_kKeyLeftBracket);
00186         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RIGHTBRACKET,   GHOST_kKeyRightBracket);
00187         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_PAUSE,          GHOST_kKeyPause);
00188 
00189         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_LSHIFT,         GHOST_kKeyLeftShift);
00190         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RSHIFT,         GHOST_kKeyRightShift);
00191         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_LCTRL,          GHOST_kKeyLeftControl);
00192         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RCTRL,          GHOST_kKeyRightControl);
00193         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_LALT,           GHOST_kKeyLeftAlt);
00194         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RALT,           GHOST_kKeyRightAlt);
00195         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_LGUI,           GHOST_kKeyOS);
00196         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RGUI,           GHOST_kKeyOS);
00197 
00198         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_INSERT,         GHOST_kKeyInsert);
00199         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_DELETE,         GHOST_kKeyDelete);
00200         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_HOME,           GHOST_kKeyHome);
00201         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_END,            GHOST_kKeyEnd);
00202         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_PAGEUP,         GHOST_kKeyUpPage);
00203         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_PAGEDOWN,       GHOST_kKeyDownPage);
00204 
00205         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_LEFT,           GHOST_kKeyLeftArrow);
00206         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_RIGHT,          GHOST_kKeyRightArrow);
00207         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_UP,             GHOST_kKeyUpArrow);
00208         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_DOWN,           GHOST_kKeyDownArrow);
00209 
00210         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_CAPSLOCK,       GHOST_kKeyCapsLock);
00211         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_SCROLLLOCK,     GHOST_kKeyScrollLock);
00212         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_NUMLOCKCLEAR,   GHOST_kKeyNumLock);
00213         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_PRINTSCREEN,    GHOST_kKeyPrintScreen);
00214 
00215         /* keypad events */
00216 
00217         /* note, sdl defines a bunch of kp defines I never saw before like
00218          * SDL_SCANCODE_KP_PERCENT, SDL_SCANCODE_KP_XOR - campbell */
00219         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_0,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad0);
00220         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_1,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad1);
00221         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_2,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad2);
00222         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_3,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad3);
00223         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_4,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad4);
00224         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_5,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad5);
00225         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_6,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad6);
00226         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_7,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad7);
00227         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_8,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad8);
00228         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_9,           GHOST_kKeyNumpad9);
00229         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_PERIOD,      GHOST_kKeyNumpadPeriod);
00230 
00231         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_ENTER,       GHOST_kKeyNumpadEnter);
00232         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_PLUS,        GHOST_kKeyNumpadPlus);
00233         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_MINUS,       GHOST_kKeyNumpadMinus);
00234         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_MULTIPLY,    GHOST_kKeyNumpadAsterisk);
00235         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_KP_DIVIDE,      GHOST_kKeyNumpadSlash);
00236 
00237         /* Media keys in some keyboards and laptops with XFree86/Xorg */
00238         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_AUDIOPLAY,      GHOST_kKeyMediaPlay);
00239         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_AUDIOSTOP,      GHOST_kKeyMediaStop);
00240         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_AUDIOPREV,      GHOST_kKeyMediaFirst);
00241         // GXMAP(type,XF86XK_AudioRewind,       GHOST_kKeyMediaFirst);
00242         GXMAP(type,SDL_SCANCODE_AUDIONEXT,      GHOST_kKeyMediaLast);
00243 
00244         default:
00245             printf("Unknown\n");
00246             type= GHOST_kKeyUnknown;
00247             break;
00248         }
00249     }
00250 
00251     return type;
00252 }
00253 #undef GXMAP

00255 
00256 void
00257 GHOST_SystemSDL::processEvent(SDL_Event *sdl_event)
00258 {
00259     GHOST_Event * g_event= NULL;
00260 
00261     switch(sdl_event->type) {
00262     case SDL_WINDOWEVENT:
00263         {
00264             SDL_WindowEvent &sdl_sub_evt= sdl_event->window;
00265             GHOST_WindowSDL *window= findGhostWindow(SDL_GetWindowFromID(sdl_sub_evt.windowID));
00266             //assert(window != NULL); // can be NULL on close window.
00267 
00268             switch (sdl_sub_evt.event) {
00269             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_EXPOSED:
00270                 g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowUpdate, window);
00271                 break;
00272             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_RESIZED:
00273                 g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowSize, window);
00274                 break;
00275             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MOVED:
00276                 g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowMove, window);
00277                 break;
00278             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_FOCUS_GAINED:
00279                 g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowActivate, window);
00280                 break;
00281             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_FOCUS_LOST:
00282                 g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowDeactivate, window);
00283                 break;
00284             case SDL_WINDOWEVENT_CLOSE:
00285                 g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventWindowClose, window);
00286                 break;
00287             }
00288         }
00289         break;
00290     case SDL_QUIT:
00291         g_event= new GHOST_Event(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventQuit, NULL);
00292         break;
00293 
00294     case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00295         {
00296             SDL_MouseMotionEvent &sdl_sub_evt= sdl_event->motion;
00297             SDL_Window *sdl_win= SDL_GetWindowFromID(sdl_sub_evt.windowID);
00298             GHOST_WindowSDL *window= findGhostWindow(sdl_win);
00299             assert(window != NULL);
00300 
00301             int x_win, y_win;
00302             SDL_GetWindowPosition(sdl_win, &x_win, &y_win);
00303 
00304             GHOST_TInt32 x_root= sdl_sub_evt.x + x_win;
00305             GHOST_TInt32 y_root= sdl_sub_evt.y + y_win;
00306 
00307 #if 0
00308             if(window->getCursorGrabMode() != GHOST_kGrabDisable && window->getCursorGrabMode() != GHOST_kGrabNormal)
00309             {
00310                 GHOST_TInt32 x_new= x_root;
00311                 GHOST_TInt32 y_new= y_root;
00312                 GHOST_TInt32 x_accum, y_accum;
00313                 GHOST_Rect bounds;
00314 
00315                 /* fallback to window bounds */
00316                 if(window->getCursorGrabBounds(bounds)==GHOST_kFailure)
00317                     window->getClientBounds(bounds);
00318 
00319                 /* could also clamp to screen bounds
00320                  * wrap with a window outside the view will fail atm  */
00321                 bounds.wrapPoint(x_new, y_new, 8); /* offset of one incase blender is at screen bounds */
00322                 window->getCursorGrabAccum(x_accum, y_accum);
00323 
00324                 // cant use setCursorPosition because the mouse may have no focus!
00325                 if(x_new != x_root || y_new != y_root) {
00326                     if (1 ) { //xme.time > m_last_warp) {
00327                         /* when wrapping we don't need to add an event because the
00328                          * setCursorPosition call will cause a new event after */
00329                         SDL_WarpMouseInWindow(sdl_win, x_new - x_win, y_new - y_win); /* wrap */
00330                         window->setCursorGrabAccum(x_accum + (x_root - x_new), y_accum + (y_root - y_new));
00331                         // m_last_warp= lastEventTime(xme.time);
00332                     } else {
00333                         // setCursorPosition(x_new, y_new); /* wrap but don't accumulate */
00334                         SDL_WarpMouseInWindow(sdl_win, x_new - x_win, y_new - y_win);
00335                     }
00336 
00337                     g_event = new GHOST_EventCursor(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventCursorMove, window, x_new, y_new);
00338                 }
00339                 else {
00340                     g_event = new GHOST_EventCursor(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventCursorMove, window, x_root + x_accum, y_root + y_accum);
00341                 }
00342             }
00343             else
00344 #endif
00345             {
00346                 g_event= new GHOST_EventCursor(getMilliSeconds(), GHOST_kEventCursorMove, window, x_root, y_root);
00347             }
00348             break;
00349         }
00350     case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00351     case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00352         {
00353             SDL_MouseButtonEvent &sdl_sub_evt= sdl_event->button;
00354             GHOST_TButtonMask gbmask= GHOST_kButtonMaskLeft;
00355             GHOST_TEventType type= (sdl_sub_evt.state==SDL_PRESSED) ? GHOST_kEventButtonDown : GHOST_kEventButtonUp;
00356 
00357             GHOST_WindowSDL *window= findGhostWindow(SDL_GetWindowFromID(sdl_sub_evt.windowID));
00358             assert(window != NULL);
00359 
00360             /* process rest of normal mouse buttons */
00361             if(sdl_sub_evt.button == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT)
00362                 gbmask= GHOST_kButtonMaskLeft;
00363             else if(sdl_sub_evt.button == SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE)
00364                 gbmask= GHOST_kButtonMaskMiddle;
00365             else if(sdl_sub_evt.button == SDL_BUTTON_RIGHT)
00366                 gbmask= GHOST_kButtonMaskRight;
00367             /* these buttons are untested! */
00368             else if(sdl_sub_evt.button == SDL_BUTTON_X1)
00369                 gbmask= GHOST_kButtonMaskButton4;
00370             else if(sdl_sub_evt.button == SDL_BUTTON_X2)
00371                 gbmask= GHOST_kButtonMaskButton5;
00372             else
00373                 break;
00374 
00375             g_event= new GHOST_EventButton(getMilliSeconds(), type, window, gbmask);
00376             break;
00377         }
00378     case SDL_MOUSEWHEEL:
00379         {
00380             SDL_MouseWheelEvent &sdl_sub_evt= sdl_event->wheel;
00381             GHOST_WindowSDL *window= findGhostWindow(SDL_GetWindowFromID(sdl_sub_evt.windowID));
00382             assert(window != NULL);
00383             g_event= new GHOST_EventWheel(getMilliSeconds(), window, sdl_sub_evt.y);
00384         }
00385         break;
00386     case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00387     case SDL_KEYUP:
00388         {
00389             SDL_KeyboardEvent &sdl_sub_evt= sdl_event->key;
00390             SDL_Keycode sym= sdl_sub_evt.keysym.sym;
00391             GHOST_TEventType type= (sdl_sub_evt.state == SDL_PRESSED) ? GHOST_kEventKeyDown : GHOST_kEventKeyUp;
00392 
00393             GHOST_WindowSDL *window= findGhostWindow(SDL_GetWindowFromID(sdl_sub_evt.windowID));
00394             assert(window != NULL);
00395 
00396             GHOST_TKey gkey= convertSDLKey(sdl_sub_evt.keysym.scancode);
00397             /* note, the sdl_sub_evt.keysym.sym is truncated, for unicode support ghost has to be modified */
00398             /* printf("%d\n", sym); */
00399             if(sym > 127) {
00400                 switch(sym) {
00401                     case SDLK_KP_DIVIDE: sym= '/'; break;
00402                     case SDLK_KP_MULTIPLY: sym= '*'; break;
00403                     case SDLK_KP_MINUS: sym= '-'; break;
00404                     case SDLK_KP_PLUS: sym= '+'; break;
00405                     case SDLK_KP_1: sym= '1'; break;
00406                     case SDLK_KP_2: sym= '2'; break;
00407                     case SDLK_KP_3: sym= '3'; break;
00408                     case SDLK_KP_4: sym= '4'; break;
00409                     case SDLK_KP_5: sym= '5'; break;
00410                     case SDLK_KP_6: sym= '6'; break;
00411                     case SDLK_KP_7: sym= '7'; break;
00412                     case SDLK_KP_8: sym= '8'; break;
00413                     case SDLK_KP_9: sym= '9'; break;
00414                     case SDLK_KP_0: sym= '0'; break;
00415                     case SDLK_KP_PERIOD: sym= '.'; break;
00416                     default: sym= 0; break;
00417                 }
00418             }
00419             else {
00420                 if(sdl_sub_evt.keysym.mod & (KMOD_LSHIFT|KMOD_RSHIFT)) {
00421                     /* lame US keyboard assumptions */
00422                     if(sym >= 'a' && sym <= ('a' + 32)) {
00423                         sym -= 32;
00424                     }
00425                     else {
00426                         switch(sym) {
00427                             case '`': sym= '~'; break;
00428                             case '1': sym= '!'; break;
00429                             case '2': sym= '@'; break;
00430                             case '3': sym= '#'; break;
00431                             case '4': sym= '$'; break;
00432                             case '5': sym= '%'; break;
00433                             case '6': sym= '^'; break;
00434                             case '7': sym= '&'; break;
00435                             case '8': sym= '*'; break;
00436                             case '9': sym= '('; break;
00437                             case '0': sym= ')'; break;
00438                             case '-': sym= '_'; break;
00439                             case '=': sym= '+'; break;
00440                             case '[': sym= '{'; break;
00441                             case ']': sym= '}'; break;
00442                             case '\\': sym= '|'; break;
00443                             case ';': sym= ':'; break;
00444                             case '\'': sym= '"'; break;
00445                             case ',': sym= '<'; break;
00446                             case '.': sym= '>'; break;
00447                             case '/': sym= '?'; break;
00448                             default:            break;
00449                         }
00450                     }
00451                 }
00452             }
00453 
00454             g_event= new GHOST_EventKey(getMilliSeconds(), type, window, gkey, sym, NULL);
00455         }
00456         break;
00457     }
00458 
00459     if (g_event) {
00460         pushEvent(g_event);
00461     }
00462 }
00463 
00464 GHOST_TSuccess
00465 GHOST_SystemSDL::getCursorPosition(GHOST_TInt32& x,
00466                                    GHOST_TInt32& y) const
00467 {
00468     int x_win, y_win;
00469     SDL_Window *win= SDL_GetMouseFocus();
00470     SDL_GetWindowPosition(win, &x_win, &y_win);
00471 
00472     int xi, yi;
00473     SDL_GetMouseState(&xi, &yi);
00474     x= xi + x_win;
00475     y= yi + x_win;
00476 
00477     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00478 }
00479 
00480 GHOST_TSuccess
00481 GHOST_SystemSDL::setCursorPosition(GHOST_TInt32 x,
00482                                    GHOST_TInt32 y)
00483 {
00484     int x_win, y_win;
00485     SDL_Window *win= SDL_GetMouseFocus();
00486     SDL_GetWindowPosition(win, &x_win, &y_win);
00487 
00488     SDL_WarpMouseInWindow(win, x - x_win, y - y_win);
00489     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00490 }
00491 
00492 bool
00493 GHOST_SystemSDL::generateWindowExposeEvents()
00494 {
00495     std::vector<GHOST_WindowSDL *>::iterator w_start= m_dirty_windows.begin();
00496     std::vector<GHOST_WindowSDL *>::const_iterator w_end= m_dirty_windows.end();
00497     bool anyProcessed= false;
00498 
00499     for (;w_start != w_end; ++w_start) {
00500         GHOST_Event * g_event= new
00501             GHOST_Event(
00502                 getMilliSeconds(),
00503                 GHOST_kEventWindowUpdate,
00504                 *w_start
00505             );
00506 
00507         (*w_start)->validate();
00508 
00509         if (g_event) {
00510             printf("Expose events pushed\n");
00511             pushEvent(g_event);
00512             anyProcessed= true;
00513         }
00514     }
00515 
00516     m_dirty_windows.clear();
00517     return anyProcessed;
00518 }
00519 
00520 
00521 bool
00522 GHOST_SystemSDL::processEvents(bool waitForEvent)
00523 {
00524     // Get all the current events -- translate them into
00525     // ghost events and call base class pushEvent() method.
00526 
00527     bool anyProcessed= false;
00528 
00529     do {
00530         GHOST_TimerManager* timerMgr= getTimerManager();
00531 
00532         if (waitForEvent && m_dirty_windows.empty() && !SDL_HasEvents(SDL_FIRSTEVENT, SDL_LASTEVENT)) {
00533             GHOST_TUns64 next= timerMgr->nextFireTime();
00534 
00535             if (next==GHOST_kFireTimeNever) {
00536                 SDL_WaitEventTimeout(NULL, -1);
00537                 //SleepTillEvent(m_display, -1);
00538             } else {
00539                 GHOST_TInt64 maxSleep= next - getMilliSeconds();
00540 
00541                 if(maxSleep >= 0) {
00542                     SDL_WaitEventTimeout(NULL, next - getMilliSeconds());
00543                     // SleepTillEvent(m_display, next - getMilliSeconds()); // X11
00544                 }
00545             }
00546         }
00547 
00548         if (timerMgr->fireTimers(getMilliSeconds())) {
00549             anyProcessed= true;
00550         }
00551 
00552         SDL_Event sdl_event;
00553         while (SDL_PollEvent(&sdl_event)) {
00554             processEvent(&sdl_event);
00555             anyProcessed= true;
00556         }
00557 
00558         if (generateWindowExposeEvents()) {
00559             anyProcessed= true;
00560         }
00561     } while (waitForEvent && !anyProcessed);
00562 
00563     return anyProcessed;
00564 }
00565 
00566 
00567 GHOST_WindowSDL *
00568 GHOST_SystemSDL::findGhostWindow(SDL_Window *sdl_win)
00569 {
00570     if (sdl_win == NULL) return NULL;
00571 
00572     // It is not entirely safe to do this as the backptr may point
00573     // to a window that has recently been removed.
00574     // We should always check the window manager's list of windows
00575     // and only process events on these windows.
00576 
00577     std::vector<GHOST_IWindow *> & win_vec= m_windowManager->getWindows();
00578 
00579     std::vector<GHOST_IWindow *>::iterator win_it= win_vec.begin();
00580     std::vector<GHOST_IWindow *>::const_iterator win_end= win_vec.end();
00581 
00582     for (; win_it != win_end; ++win_it) {
00583         GHOST_WindowSDL * window= static_cast<GHOST_WindowSDL *>(*win_it);
00584         if (window->getSDLWindow() == sdl_win) {
00585             return window;
00586         }
00587     }
00588     return NULL;
00589 }
00590 
00591 
00592 void
00593 GHOST_SystemSDL::addDirtyWindow(GHOST_WindowSDL *bad_wind)
00594 {
00595     GHOST_ASSERT((bad_wind != NULL), "addDirtyWindow() NULL ptr trapped (window)");
00596 
00597     m_dirty_windows.push_back(bad_wind);
00598 }
00599 
00600 
00601 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_SystemSDL::getButtons(GHOST_Buttons& buttons) const
00602 {
00603     Uint8 state= SDL_GetMouseState(NULL, NULL);
00604     buttons.set(GHOST_kButtonMaskLeft,   (state & SDL_BUTTON_LMASK) != 0);
00605     buttons.set(GHOST_kButtonMaskMiddle, (state & SDL_BUTTON_MMASK) != 0);
00606     buttons.set(GHOST_kButtonMaskRight,  (state & SDL_BUTTON_RMASK) != 0);
00607 
00608     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00609 }
00610 
00611 GHOST_TUns8 *
00612 GHOST_SystemSDL::getClipboard(bool selection) const
00613 {
00614     return (GHOST_TUns8 *)SDL_GetClipboardText();
00615 }
00616 
00617 void
00618 GHOST_SystemSDL::putClipboard(GHOST_TInt8 *buffer, bool selection) const
00619 {
00620     SDL_SetClipboardText(buffer);
00621 }
00622 
00623 GHOST_TUns64
00624 GHOST_SystemSDL::getMilliSeconds()
00625 {
00626     return GHOST_TUns64(SDL_GetTicks()); /* note, 32 -> 64bits */
00627 }
